title: Pestilence

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - You add the maximum stacks of pestilence to any player you visit

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Any player who visits you will have 1 stack of pestilence spread onto them
- Players who visit another player will spread 1 stack of pestilence to them.
- At 3 stacks of pestilence a player will succumb and die.
- Horsemen cannot have more than 1 stack of pestilence.
- You are immune to roleblocks.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Kill everyone that would oppose you.

desc:
Post 3874
*It's hilarious that this role was actually nerfed by not having Roleblock and Control immunity. Doesn't hurt this one as much, but it hurts War a lot.*
